Class ItemController

The Item controller is generated based on the Item domain model and Item View Model classes. This controller manages items by allowing the admin to add new items, list them, and edit and delete them. Only the admin is allowed to access this controller

Inheritance
System.Object
ItemController
Namespace: WorkflowManagementSystem.Controllers
Assembly: WorkflowManagementSystem.dll
Syntax
public class ItemController : Controller
